description: The DevOps Engineer is a single point of failure for all infrastructure and CI/CD tasks in Sprint 1.
mitigation_strategy: Schedule knowledge transfer sessions with the Senior Backend Developer on Terraform and pipeline monitoring.
contingency_plan: The Tech Lead will act as a backup to review and approve infrastructure code.
monitoring_trigger: Any DevOps task is delayed by more than 2 days.

description: The complexity of the Saga and Transactional Outbox patterns (TASK-005) is high and relies solely on the Senior Backend Developer's expertise.
mitigation_strategy: Mandate pair programming between the senior and mid-level developers for this task. Allocate extra time for architectural review with the Tech Lead.
contingency_plan: If implementation proves too complex, revert to a simpler, less resilient synchronous API call pattern as a temporary measure and log the technical debt.
monitoring_trigger: The task exceeds its estimated time by more than 30%.

description: The low utilization of the backend team in Sprint 2 (28%) creates a risk of resources being reallocated to other projects, jeopardizing the project timeline if they are not available when needed.
mitigation_strategy: Work with management to officially allocate a percentage of the team's time to 'innovation' or 'tech debt' stories to fill the sprint, or pull forward well-defined stories from the next project phase.
contingency_plan: Re-plan Sprint 2 tasks into a single week, effectively compressing the timeline to 3 weeks total.
monitoring_trigger: A team member is assigned a task from another project during Sprint 2.
